enum HAlign: int;
Horizontal Alignment.

@trusted string toMathML(T)(T x) if (isScalarType!T && !isFloatingPoint!T);
Generic case.

@trusted string toML(T)(T x, bool usePowPlus = false, bool useLeadZeros = false, MarkupLang mlang = MarkupLang.HTML) if (isFloatingPoint!T);
Return x in format. See also: http://forum.dlang.org/thread/awkynfizwqjnbilgddbh@forum.dlang.org#post-awkynfizwqjnbilgddbh:40forum.dlang.org See also: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/MathML/Element/mn See also: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/MathML/Element/msup

pure @safe string toMathML(T)(Rational!T x, bool bevelled = false, HAlign numalign = HAlign.center, HAlign denomalign = HAlign.center, string href = null);
